scenario_text.value:
Yes, I suppose the students would come and
eat here instead of in their classrooms.

Is that right...? I didn’t expect to see
a cafeteria in a school like this.

It’s a bit rare to be sure, but it isn’t
completely unheard of.

In some schools, all the students will gather
to eat lunch together.

Huh, I see. You sure know all kinds of
things, Aoi.
Ah, not at all... Just a bit of trivia.

At any rate, this school certainly seems to
have seen better days...

We have to find a first-aid kit as soon as
possible!
